Articles.Content:
Hello, and I'm Icarus Vice. I'm the director of the Kerbal Aerospace and 'Splosion Association, or KASA. I'm responsible for, uh, let's see here, uh, EXISTING! I'm responsible for existing! Just want to say hello, so, hello!

And if anyone knows how to get blog/article permission, then I would be happy
Thanks, Skunky! I've already killed Jebediah and Bill, though Bob is (unfortunately) still alive.

Welcome to the community Icarus_Vice

You need to get over 5 posts then be automatically upgraded to a Bottle Rocketeer before you can post blogs, you should be able to view them but there's a forum bug at the moment, sorry
Thanks, I think I am already a bottle rocketeer. Hope I can start posting about my wonderful misadventures soon. Haven't gotten 0.19 to work so I'm using 0.17.
Haha welcome 1.9 is soo much better than 1.7

Sure... In my first act as director of the Kerbal Aerospace and 'Splosion Association, I hearby sarcastically state that "Yes, because crashing every second launch is SO much better than not."

No offense. My experience has been tainted with laggy launches and game crashes.
